original_title: Motorcycle Mania 3: Jesse James Rides Again
overview: Documentary follows notorious motorcycle outlaw Jesse James on a wild ride through one year of his life. The owner of West Coast Choppers ditches his wife and business and sets out with a full tank of gas. With best friend Kid Rock along for the ride, James ends up on a cross-country road odyssey that eventually winds up in Mexico, the land of Cervezas, fun, sun and firearms!
title: Motorcycle Mania 3: Jesse James Rides Again
